purpose: A React footer component that displays company information, navigation links, social media icons, and legal/compliance information with internationalization support

variables.name: footerLinks
variables.purpose: Stores all footer navigation links organized by category
variables.usage: Object containing arrays of link objects with name (from translation) and href properties for each footer section

key_points: Uses internationalization (i18n) through useLanguage hook for multi-language support
Responsive grid layout that adapts from 1 column on mobile to 6 columns on desktop
Includes four main link categories: Product, Company, Resources, and Legal
Features social media icon buttons for Twitter, LinkedIn, GitHub, and Email
Displays compliance badges (GDPR, ISO 27001) and company statistics

patterns: Component composition pattern with UI components
Internationalization pattern using context-based translation function
Responsive design using Tailwind CSS grid utilities
Consistent hover state styling for interactive elements
issues: All links currently point to anchor fragments (#) - likely placeholders that need actual routes
Hard-coded Chinese text in legal links array ('GDPR合规') and footer bottom section should use translation keys
Social media buttons don't have actual click handlers or href attributes
Missing aria-labels on social media icon buttons for accessibility
The 'Resources' section uses 'footer.support' translation key which might be confusing naming
